summary: An ordinance relating to and authorizing the Corporation Counsel to commence and prosecute on behalf of the City and/or to join with other cities in prosecuting proceedings to determine the application and/or validity of provisions of Session Laws, 1933, levying or imposing license fees, taxes or excises upon the sale of, or the business of selling, electricity and water, and/or the street railway business, in so far as the same may relate to such sales by or such business conducted by the City.
